basics.name: Diego Iván Padilla Bernal
basics.label: Full Stack JS Developer
basics.summary: Web developer with over 7 years of experience creating high-performance websites and scalable web application. Skilled in full-stack development with Javascript, solving complex problems through code, and mentoring junior developers. Key accomplishments include leading the development of systems that improved operational efficiency. Passionate about optimizing user experiences and ensuring quality in every project.

tasks.summary: Developed and launched a multi-platform restaurant management system, covering frontend, backend (API), and supporting the mobile app.
Designed a custom system for a global transportation company to manage customer relationships and sales, which improved workflow efficiency by 40%.

Led the development of a custom system focused on registering individuals and creating records of entries and exits, as well as other functionalities such as searching for people in different databases, either by name, face recognition, and/or fingerprint scanning.
Built an ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system covering all operations for a private company, significantly enhancing data accuracy and operational speed

Developed internal libraries for use in ongoing projects: node-hbs-to-pdf (for generating PDFs), internal react manage forms (for handling forms), Internal UI Framework (Design components), and created an address API service for internal use.
